title: Is there an offical word for Fear of Yordles?
body:
I'm planning to try my hand at Champion Creation and my first champion has a Fear of Yordles.
was wondering if Riot has an Official word for like Yordlephobia or something more creative.
In-game the Champion would start to break the 4th wall by shouting at the summoner/you to stop moving them closer to any Yordle.

replies.body: The word comes from the Latin word Yordle  mixed with phobia it is Yordéciosphobia
i don't know the official name of it but whatever your champion idea is, that sounds awesome, i respect you for having a go with the champion ideas :D

"Achondroplasiaphobia is the fear of little people or midgets"
"aka Nanosophobia or Lollypopguildophobia" 

-doctor google

yeah Yordlephobia seems most likely 
(very basic guess, if I dug deeper I am sure I could find an actual term)
